

API Reference
-------------
**mellipayamak** is an **OTP(One Time Password)** *api*. which it's main job is to provide 4-digit long, one time usage passwords
for logging in to user accounts. 
so when the user attempts to log in to their account a request is sent to the api and the otp code is sent to the phone number 
provided by user. then when the users enter the 4-digit code the login is successful and they can enter to the staff-panel.

**The OTP app codes were provided by the api provider so in order to inspect the codes you can find them in this path 
root/mellipayamak**
